name: bp_par_localite
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bps.
Tool description: Les boîtes postales (BPs), codes postaux, localités,communes, codes cedex de Nouvelle-Calédonie.
API description: Fetches postal boxes by locality in New Caledonia using the provided RapidAPI key.

localite.description: The locality for which to fetch postal boxes. Defaults to 'poum'.
